newsitem.title: LITHUANIA: SPIRIT PRODUCER SEMA'S PROFIT UP IN 1996.
newsitem.headline: SPIRIT PRODUCER SEMA'S PROFIT UP IN 1996.

text.p: Lithuanian spirits producer Sema reported on Monday that its 1996 net profit climbed to 6.4 million litas versus 252,835 litas in 1995.
The company also said in a statement of audited results that its turnover in 1996 was 54.8 million litas versus 23.3 million litas in 1995. It gave no comparisons for other figures.
The company said that its 1996 gross profit was 18.5 million litas and the profit from operations was 10.1 million litas.
The company reported that its profit before taxes reached 8.2 million litas. It added that its assets at the end of 1996 were worth 39.7 million litas.
The state has a 27.2 percent stake in the company, which is listed on the Vilnius bourse's A group.
